question: What consoles is Red Dead Redemption 2 compatible with?
phrase: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PC
predAns: "Red Dead Redemption 2 is compatible with PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S."
oriLLMans: ["Red Dead Redemption 2 is compatible with PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S."]; [3, 5]
oriSent: Red Dead Redemption 2 is compatible with the following consoles: PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5) via backward compatibility, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S via backward compatibility, PC.

question: Does Red Dead Redemption 2 support cross-play?
predAns: No, at the time of writing in 2024, Red Dead Online still does not support cross-platform play.
oriLLMans: [No, at the time of writing in 2024, Red Dead Online still does not support cross-platform play.]; [2]
oriSent: Please note that the game does not support any kind of cross-play.

question: Can players on different consoles play together?
phrase: No, players on different consoles cannot play together.
predAns: No, Red Dead Online does not support cross-platform play
oriLLMans: [No, Red Dead Online does not support cross-platform play]; [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8]
oriSent: Only PC players can play with PC players, only PlayStation players can play with PlayStation players, and only Xbox players can play with Xbox players.

question: Can players continue their progress if they switch to a different console within the same brand?
predAns: Yes, players can continue their progress if they switch to a different console within the same brand.
oriLLMans: [Yes, players can continue their progress if they switch to a different console within the same brand.]; [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
oriSent: However, you are able to continue progress if you play on PS4 and later install it on your PS5, or start on Xbox One and pick it up on Xbox Series.
